scripts.generate-java: mkdir -p target/generated-sources/java/edu/colorado/cires/pace/data && quicktype -s schema src/main/resources/schema/*.json -l java --package edu.colorado.cires.pace.data -o target/generated-sources/java/edu/colorado/cires/pace/data/. --array-type list --just-types
scripts.generate-python: mkdir -p target/generated-sources/python/pacedata && quicktype -s schema src/main/resources/schema/*.json -l python -o target/generated-sources/python/pacedata/objects.py
